data.title: Tictactoe
data.shortDescription: Four player tictactoe where you take each other's pieces
data.longDescription: Developed in Golang and deployed on AWS, offers a multiplayer experience for up to four players concurrently across multiple rooms. The real-time feature enables players to observe live moves as participants drag their pieces during gameplay, facilitated through WebSocket technology.

data.title: Gentoo
data.shortDescription: Twitter clone with hate speech classification
data.longDescription: A twitter clone integrated with an internally developed BERT hate speech classifier. Employs multi-task text classification to assess hatefulness and targeted communities. Enables administrators to moderate the platform using our developed AI model.

data.title: Me
data.longDescription: My personalized mark on the internet serving as my online resume and dictionary of sorts

data.title: Textra
data.longDescription: A desktop application that enables users to message and search for other users, bookmark conversations, and create groups. Implements administrative features such as registration requests and banning of users.

data.title: Scribe
data.shortDescription: Generate slides and transcription from a lecture video

data.title: Graph algorithms visualizer
data.shortDescription: Dijkstra's path finding, Depth-First Search, Breadth-First Search
data.longDescription: Visualizes a graph in a radial manner given the graphâ€™s edges and weights. Highlights the edges an algorithm visits while it is running.

data.title: Huffman tree visualizer
data.shortDescription: Visualize the step by step process of the huffman compression algorithm

data.title: Events management system
data.shortDescription: CRUD application to manage your events
data.longDescription: Events management system with PHP and Express backend integrated with a MySQL database.

data.title: Roots calculator
data.shortDescription: Approximate the roots of an equation using bracketing methods
data.longDescription:
Bracketing methods you can use: Bisection, False Position, Newton Rhapson, Secant, Simple Fixed Point Iteration, Non-Linear.
 Built with Flask hosted on Heroku

data.title: Volunteer management system
data.shortDescription: CRUD application to manage events and volunteers
data.longDescription: An application that enables event managers to create and manage events that volunteers want to take part in.

data.title: Calculator
data.longDescription: First project that I was proud of :D Implemented the shunting yard algorithm for this calculator. Made this in my first year of taking comptuer science degree.
